document.masterDocTitle: Muscidae (Insecta: Diptera) of Latin America and the Caribbean: geographic distribution and check-list by country

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Muscidae (Insecta: Diptera) of Latin America and the Caribbean: geographic distribution and check-list by country

bibRefCitation.author: Giglio-Tos, H.
bibRefCitation.refString: Giglio-Tos, H. (1893) Diagnosi di nuovi generi e di nuove specie di Ditteri. VIII. Bollettino dei Musei di Zoologia ed Anatomia Comparata della Regia Universita di Torino, VIII, No. 147, 1 - 11.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Brazil , Belize , Colombia , El Salvador , Guatemala , Guyana , Honduras , Mexico , Nicaragua , Panama , Peru , Trinidad and Tobago , Venezuela .

BRAZIL , Amazonas, Manaus, BR 17, -3.1019 , -60.0250 ( DZUP ); Maranhão , São Luiz, -2.5297 , -44.3028 ( MNRJ ); Mato Grosso , Estrada Cuiabá-Santarem Km 500-600, -12.5167 , -55.6167 ( DZUP ); Mato Grosso , Sinop, - 12.5167 , -55.6167 ( MNRJ ); Mato Grosso do Sul , Salobra, -21.2333 , -57.1333 ( MNRJ ); Pará, Tucuruí, -3.7661 , - 49.6725 ( DZUP ); Paraná , Curitiba, -25.4278 , -49.2731 ( DZUP ); Rio de Janeiro , Angra dos Reis, -23.0067 , - 44.3181 ( MNRJ ); Rio de Janeiro , Jacarepaguá, -22.9333 , -43.3667 ( MNRJ ); São Paulo , Campinas, -22.9056 , - 47.0608 ( Linhares 1981 ); BELIZE ( Snyder 1954a , Stein 1918 ); COLOMBIA , Antioquia , Turbo, 8.1000 , -76.7333 ( Snyder 1954a ); Santa Fé de Biogotá, Bogotá , 4.6333 , -74.0833 ( Malloch 1925 ); Valle del Cauca , Distrito Cali, 3.4000 , -76.5000 ( Snyder 1954a ); EL SALVADOR , San Salvador , San Salvador , 13.6667 , -89.1667 ( Snyder 1954a ); GUATEMALA , Guatemala , La Providencia, 15.4667 , -90.5500 ( DZUP ); GUYANA , Bartica, Kartabo, 5.7833 , -57.6333 ( Curran 1934b ); Potaro-Siparuni , Kaieteur, 5.0000 , -59.5000 ( Curran 1934b ); HONDURAS , Manatee ( Stein 1918 ); MEXICO , Chiapas , Tapachula, 14.9000 , -92.2500 ( DZUP ); Coahuila , Guerrero , 28.3000 , - 100.3833 ( DZUP ); Guerrero , Tierra Colorado, 17.1633 , -99.4894 ( Wulp 1896b ); Tabasco , Frontera, 18.5333 , - 92.6500 ( Wulp 1896b ); Tabasco , Teapa, 17.5833 , -92.9333 ( Wulp 1896b ); Tuxpango, Sumichrast, 18.8167 , - 97.0167 ( Giglio-Tos 1893 ); Vera Cruz, Dona Maria, 20.5667 , -97.1000 ( Stein 1918 ); Vera Cruz, S. Lucrecia, 17.4333 , -95.0333 ( Stein 1918 ); NICARAGUA , Managua , Managua , 12.1500 , -86.2833 ( Snyder 1954a ); PANAMA , Alhajuelo ( Snyder 1954a ); Canal Zone, Balboa, 8.9500 , -79.5500 ( Snyder 1954a ); Canal Zone, Barro Colorado, 9.1772 , -79.8322 ( Snyder 1954a , MNRJ ); Chiriquí , David, 8.4333 , -82.4333 ( Snyder 1954a ); Coclé , El Valle, 8.6500 , -80.1333 ( Snyder 1954a ); Colón , Porto Bella, 9.5500 , -79.6167 ( Snyder 1954a ); Colón , Portobello, 9.5500 , -79.6499 ( MNRJ ); PANAMA , La Chorrara, 8.8500 , -79.7667 ( Snyder 1954a ); PERU , Loreto , Iquitos, - 3.7667 , -73.2500 ( Snyder 1954a ); Río Pachitea, -8.7629 , -74.5380 ( Stein 1911 ); TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO , Grenada, 12.1167 , -61.6667 ( Snyder 1954a ); VENEZUELA , Distrito Federal, Caracas, 10.5000 , -66.9167 ( Snyder 1954a ).
